name: $initialFill
desc: Returns: Indicates the quantity or duration for the first dispense of the medication.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates the quantity or duration for the first dispense of the medication.

name: $dispenseInterval
desc: Returns: The minimum period of time that must occur between dispenses of the medication.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The minimum period of time that must occur between dispenses of the medication.

name: $validityPeriod
desc: Returns: This indicates the validity period of a prescription (stale dating the Prescription).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: This indicates the validity period of a prescription (stale dating the Prescription).

name: $numberOfRepeatsAllowed
desc: Returns: An integer indicating the number of times, in addition to the original dispense, (aka refills or repeats) that the patient can receive the prescribed medication. Usage Notes: This integer does not include the original order dispense. This means that if an order indicates dispense 30 tablets plus "3 repeats", then the order can be dispensed a total of 4 times and the patient can receive a total of 120 tablets.  A prescriber may explicitly say that zero refills are permitted after the initial dispense.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An integer indicating the number of times, in addition to the original dispense, (aka refills or repeats) that the patient can receive the prescribed medication. Usage Notes: This integer does not include the original order dispense. This means that if an

name: $quantity
desc: Returns: The amount that is to be dispensed for one fill.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The amount that is to be dispensed for one fill.

name: $expectedSupplyDuration
desc: Returns: Identifies the period time over which the supplied product is expected to be used, or the length of time the dispense is expected to last.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identifies the period time over which the supplied product is expected to be used, or the length of time the dispense is expected to last.

name: $performer
desc: Returns: Indicates the intended dispensing Organization specified by the prescriber.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates the intended dispensing Organization specified by the prescriber.
